name: Monster Splitter
description:
Monster Splitter is an Action Shoot'em up mobile game, with a more relaxing farming section.

The gameplay is a frenetic 2D vertical shooter with a game mechanics reminiscent of PANG, in fact the enemies splitt when get hit. In addition to this gameplay in Monster Splitter the player will found a less frenetic activity, were upgrading, planting and growing space plants.

THE GAME

In the game the players in the vest of an alien professor's assistant will travel the galaxy trying to collect  as much space seeds as possible.

Why seeds? Well to grow exotic space plants and sell space spieces you need to find and collect those rare seeds.



But it's not an easy task, those alien planets are full of monsters that will try to prevent your seed extraction, use these portable cannons to defendo your drills!



Don't be fooled by their cute little faces, they are ready to crush you and your equipment in a second!



Be ready to fight back these monsters and defend your drills! Collect as much seeds as you can and return to your base.
